### TO RADIANS
Converts a number in [degrees](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Degree_(angle)) to [radians](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radian).

```esql
ROW deg = [90.0, 180.0, 270.0]
| EVAL rad = TO_RADIANS(deg)
```
